title: Sherrice Iverson // 75
description:
In 1997, a 7-year-old girl drove to Nevada with her father and step-brother for a Memorial Day Weekend trip to a casino. When she was left in the casino's arcade without adult supervision in the early morning hours, a predator found his way to her instead. This is the murder of Sherrice Iverson.
